title: @Kindlejack are the Steel Legion and Dreadnova skins related?
body:
You mentioned before about a possible relationship between the two skin lines as factions in a space opera but it wasn't concrete. Could you settle a debate and confirm whether there is, in fact, a link?

Also, does Eternum fit into this universe?

replies.body: When working on DN Darius there was talk of combining the above themes into a space opera [steel legion, dreadnova, eternum], but it was never really hashed out so not officially no.

This directly & other very fitting skinline combinations would hold so much exciting potential for the future.

Cosmic & Dark Star are a perfect match for each other in terms of dualism, visually and thematically as potentially for storytelling (the wardens of the universe protecting existence itself, for example created by consciousness/the ''overmind'' itself to cleanse space from space parasites). A lot of players connect Dark Star to Star Guardian just because of the ''Star'' showcased in the name itself I have the feeling; both skinlines do have no harmony at all with each other â€“ one is straightly cute & shiny anime, the other grimdark cosmic horror with a much more ''serious'' design.
I agree on both counts. As skins continue to evolve I hope we see more development around alt universes!

Honestly they rarely connect skin universes unless these connections are rather obvious.

I mean people speculate that Project,Program,Battlecast or mecha are related,but none of them are.
Same goes for dark star and star guardian.
